event.title: received his degree in internal medicine from the University of Toronto in 1992

data.event: "After he received his degree in internal medicine from the University of Toronto in 1992, he spent three years at McGill University in Montreal doing his dermatological residencyHe said he was proud to be accepted to study dermatology at McGill, one of the most prestigious universities in Canada.

event.title: this week with tick bites," he said

data.event: "You'd be amazed, I've seen three people already this week with tick bites," he said.
